Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: A simple prayer — three rhyming lines

Bod789.Transcription:
Ihesu for þi woundis widewiþ þi meeknesse fordo my
                    prideand alle yuel þat mai me bitide
Bod789.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 337.
Gray,  Douglas. 
             “The Five Wounds of Our Lord.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 10 [208] (1963): 50-51, 82-89, 127-34, 163-8: 128.
